attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2025-0797

Date: 2025-11-13

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that the Honourable Michael Brundrett, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, be appointed a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia.

The Committee further advises that the Honourable Michael Brundrett be appointed a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Yukon during his tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia.


Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable Michael Brundrett, juge de la Cour suprême de la Colombie-Britannique, soit nommé juge d’appel de la Cour d’appel de la Colombie-Britannique;

Le Comité du Conseil privé recommande en outre que l’honorable Michael Brundrett soit nommé juge de la Cour d’appel du Yukon pendant la durée de ses fonctions à titre de juge d’appel à la Cour d’appel de la Colombie-Britannique.

The Committee further advises that the Honourable Michael Brundrett be appointed a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Yukon during his tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia.
